name: css-to-go
description: A bit of global CSS to help shape up the looks of a plain HTML document.  Has a dark mode and a light mode.
author: P.Envall <petter.envall@gmail.com>

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production astro build && cp -R docs docs-local
scripts.postbuild: npm run copy:dist && npm run process:docs && npm run touch-nojekyll && echo '----- Done'
scripts.copy:dist: cat docs-local/_astro/*.css > dist/css-to-go.min.css && npx prettier docs-local/_astro/*.css > dist/css-to-go.css
scripts.clean: rm -rf docs docs-local dist && mkdir dist
